why.headline: The problems we are solving for

feature01.headline: Low quality work
feature01.description: Traditional agencies typically work on simple short-term projects and are not familiar with building complex SaaS products.

feature01.headline: Broken collaboration
feature01.description: Traditional agencies work in silo. You are blind-sided from their progress and frustration builds when the end-result is less than desirable.

feature01.headline: Lacking context
feature01.description: Constantly context-switch leads to teams lacking business context as well as in-depth industry knowledge.

feature02.headline: Long, arduous hiring process
feature02.description: Hiring a full-timer can be a daunting task: vetting the right candidates, figuring out scheduling logistics, the back-and-forth negotiations, the ghosting, and the turn-downs.

feature02.headline: High risk
feature02.description: After months of onboarding and integrating this person into the team, you realized you hired the wrong person.

feature02.headline: High costs
feature02.description: Along with the salary, you will be paying premium for employee benefits.
